verbose_text: To address this limitation different strategies have been successfully adopted to modify the glycosylation pattern of plant derived mAbs which include the modulation of plant glycosylation using RNA interference, the co-expression of specific human glycosyltransferases, or the exploitation of specific knockout transgenic lines that synthesize complex N - glycans lacking immunogenic xylose and fucose epitopes and/or the retention of the immunoglobulin in the endoplasmic reticulum (ER).
evidence: synthesize complex N-glycans lacking immunogenic xylose and fucose epitopes                             and/or the retention of the immunoglobulin in the endoplasmic reticulum (ER
